title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 60.8 - Discretionary testing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 60.8 - Discretionary testing

State Regulations

The department may require an entire herd or any deer in
the herd to be tested or retested for tuberculosis as is necessary to promote
the suppression or eradication of the disease. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
60.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
